languages.text: "Россказни про "мы пошли мародерствовать за ботинками и нечаянно подобрали еретический амулет" меня не убеждают. Эти люди — без пяти минут бунтовщики и, возможно, пособники Архиврага. Нельзя идти у них на поводу. Нельзя забывать, что скверна часто влияет исподволь. Даже если они забрали что-то без злого умысла, исключительно по причине выдающегося скудоумия, — это не значит, что скверна их не запятнала".

"The story about going scavenging for boots and 'accidentally picking up a heretical amulet' doesn't convince me. These people were moments away from rebelling and, possibly, becoming minions of the Archenemy. We must not give them what they want. Even if they did acquire something innocently, purely out of their own stupidity, that does not mean they are not tainted with corruption."
languages.original_text: "Россказни про "мы пошли мародерствовать за ботинками и нечаянно подобрали еретический амулет" меня не убеждают. Эти люди — без пяти минут бунтовщики и, возможно, пособники Архиврага. Нельзя идти у них на поводу. Нельзя забывать, что скверна часто влияет исподволь. Даже если они забрали что-то без злого умысла, исключительно по причине выдающегося скудоумия, — это не значит, что скверна их не запятнала".

Even if they did acquire something innocently, purely out of their own stupidity, that does not mean they are not tainted with corruption."

languages.text: “他们声称的搜刮靴子，还有‘一不小心捡起了异端护身符’的故事并不能说服我。这些人距离发动叛乱，或者说， 距离成为混沌大敌的爪牙，只有一线距离。我们决不能把他们想要的东西给他们。即使他们真的没有怀着任何异心，仅仅是由于愚蠢而得到了某些东西，也并不意味着他们没有被腐化侵蚀。”
languages.original_text: "The story about going scavenging for boots and 'accidentally picking up a heretical amulet' doesn't convince me. These people were moments away from rebelling and, possibly, becoming minions of the Archenemy. We must not give them what they want. Even if they did acquire something innocently, purely out of their own stupidity, that does not mean they are not tainted with corruption."

traits.locale_text: “他们声称的搜刮靴子，还有‘一不小心捡起了异端护身符’的故事并不能说服我。这些人距离发动叛乱，或者说， 距离成为混沌大敌的爪牙，只有一线距离。我们决不能把他们想要的东西给他们。即使他们真的没有怀着任何异心，仅仅是由于愚蠢而得到了某些东西，也并不意味着他们没有被腐化侵蚀。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Esa historia de ir a robar botas y "recoger un amuleto hereje por error" no me convence. Esta gente estaba a un paso de rebelarse y, posiblemente, de volverse secuaces del Archienemigo. No debemos darles lo que quieren. Aunque hayan adquirido un objeto así por accidente, sin mayor motivo que su propia estupidez, no significa que no estén mancillados por la corrupción».
languages.original_text: "The story about going scavenging for boots and 'accidentally picking up a heretical amulet' doesn't convince me. These people were moments away from rebelling and, possibly, becoming minions of the Archenemy. We must not give them what they want. Even if they did acquire something innocently, purely out of their own stupidity, that does not mean they are not tainted with corruption."

traits.locale_text: «Esa historia de ir a robar botas y "recoger un amuleto hereje por error" no me convence. Esta gente estaba a un paso de rebelarse y, posiblemente, de volverse secuaces del Archienemigo. No debemos darles lo que quieren. Aunque hayan adquirido un objeto así por accidente, sin mayor motivo que su propia estupidez, no significa que no estén mancillados por la corrupción».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ブーツを漁りに行って、偶然異端のお守りを拾ったという話にはどうにも納得しかねます。彼らは反乱を起こし、渾沌の勢力の手先になる寸前だったのです。彼らの望むものを与えてはなりません。たとえ彼らが無邪気に、純粋に自分たちの愚かさから何かを手に入れたとしても、彼らが腐敗に染まっていないということにはならないのですから」
languages.original_text: "The story about going scavenging for boots and 'accidentally picking up a heretical amulet' doesn't convince me. These people were moments away from rebelling and, possibly, becoming minions of the Archenemy. We must not give them what they want. Even if they did acquire something innocently, purely out of their own stupidity, that does not mean they are not tainted with corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「ブーツを漁りに行って、偶然異端のお守りを拾ったという話にはどうにも納得しかねます。彼らは反乱を起こし、渾沌の勢力の手先になる寸前だったのです。彼らの望むものを与えてはなりません。たとえ彼らが無邪気に、純粋に自分たちの愚かさから何かを手に入れたとしても、彼らが腐敗に染まっていないということにはならないのですから」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Die Geschichte, dass jemand Stiefel klauen wollte und 'versehentlich ein ketzerisches Amulett eingesteckt hat', überzeugt mich nicht. Diese Leute standen kurz davor, eine Rebellion zu starten und vielleicht zu Schergen des Erzfeindes zu werden. Wir dürfen ihnen nicht geben, was sie wollen. Selbst, wenn sie etwas ganz unschuldig in ihren Besitz gebracht haben, aus purer Dummheit ... sie könnten dennoch von der Verderbnis verdorben sein."
languages.original_text: "The story about going scavenging for boots and 'accidentally picking up a heretical amulet' doesn't convince me. These people were moments away from rebelling and, possibly, becoming minions of the Archenemy. We must not give them what they want. Even if they did acquire something innocently, purely out of their own stupidity, that does not mean they are not tainted with corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Die Geschichte, dass jemand Stiefel klauen wollte und 'versehentlich ein ketzerisches Amulett eingesteckt hat', überzeugt mich nicht. Diese Leute standen kurz davor, eine Rebellion zu starten und vielleicht zu Schergen des Erzfeindes zu werden. Wir dürfen ihnen nicht geben, was sie wollen. Selbst, wenn sie etwas ganz unschuldig in ihren Besitz gebracht haben, aus purer Dummheit ... sie könnten dennoch von der Verderbnis verdorben sein."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai du mal à croire que ces canailles soient tombées accidentellement sur une amulette hérétique en récupérant des bottes sur un cadavre. Ces gens étaient à deux doigts de se rebeller, voire de passer sous la coupe du Grand Ennemi. Nous ne pouvons pas accéder à leurs demandes. Même si ce sont des abrutis finis et qu'ils ont trouvé cette cochonnerie par hasard, ça ne veut pas dire qu'ils ne sont pas d'ores et déjà contaminés par la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "The story about going scavenging for boots and 'accidentally picking up a heretical amulet' doesn't convince me. These people were moments away from rebelling and, possibly, becoming minions of the Archenemy. We must not give them what they want. Even if they did acquire something innocently, purely out of their own stupidity, that does not mean they are not tainted with corruption."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai du mal à croire que ces canailles soient tombées accidentellement sur une amulette hérétique en récupérant des bottes sur un cadavre. Ces gens étaient à deux doigts de se rebeller, voire de passer sous la coupe du Grand Ennemi. Nous ne pouvons pas accéder à leurs demandes. Même si ce sont des abrutis finis et qu'ils ont trouvé cette cochonnerie par hasard, ça ne veut pas dire qu'ils ne sont pas d'ores et déjà contaminés par la corruption. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Çizme aramak için yola çıkıp 'yanlışlıkla kâfir uğurluğu bulmak', bana pek ikna edici gelmedi. Bu insanlar neredeyse isyan edecekti, belki de Şerbaşı'nın kulları olacaklardı. İsteklerini yerine getirmemiz faydamıza olmaz. Aptallıkları sebebiyle ellerine bir şey geçirmiş olsalar da bu, yozlaşmadıkları anlamına gelmez."
languages.original_text: "The story about going scavenging for boots and 'accidentally picking up a heretical amulet' doesn't convince me. These people were moments away from rebelling and, possibly, becoming minions of the Archenemy. We must not give them what they want. Even if they did acquire something innocently, purely out of their own stupidity, that does not mean they are not tainted with corruption."

İsteklerini yerine getirmemiz faydamıza olmaz. Aptallıkları sebebiyle ellerine bir şey geçirmiş olsalar da bu, yozlaşmadıkları anlamına gelmez."
